sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Menu } from './model/menu'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'], }) export class HeaderComponent { @Input() menu: Menu; constructor() { this.menu = { home: 'Home', about: 'About', gallery: 'Gallery', }; } }
Logo
  • {{ menu.home }}
  • {{ menu.about }}
  • {{ menu.gallery }}
